tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  risk_category VARCHAR(100),
  risk_level ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
    requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    requirement_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    regulatory_body VARCHAR(100),
    applicable_industries TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE assessment_history (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(100),
    assessment_result VARCHAR(50),
    risk_assessment_id INT REFERENCES risk_assessment_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_data (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   entity_name VARCHAR(50),
   assessment_date DATE,
   risk_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_issues (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   entity_name VARCHAR(50),
   issue_description TEXT,
   issue_category VARCHAR(50),
   severity_level VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_standards (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   standard_name VARCHAR(100),
   responsible_agency VARCHAR(100),
   compliance_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE assessment_history (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   assessment_id INT,
   assessment_date DATE,
   assessment_result TEXT
)
